SEARCH

Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
VendingMachine
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpecialVM
public class VendingMachine extends Object
Vending Machine.

Vending machine that is composed of slot with items and denominations, performs tasks such as making transaction with user and maintenance mode such as Stocking/Restocking, replenishing money, and printing transactions.

    • displayTransactions

      public void displayTransactions()

      Displays the transactions made in the Vending Machine. Shows the items sold, their prices, the quantity sold, and the corresponding profit.

      public boolean dispenseProduct(int index, int c)
      Product dispenser
      Parameters:
      index - index is the index of the item.
      c - c is case type (ignore c in Regular, it only matters in Special)
      Returns:
      boolean value, will set to true if dispense take place.

    • addToDenomination

      public void addToDenomination(Denomination to, Denomination from)

      Adds the values of each denomination in the 'from' object to the corresponding values in the 'to' object. The result is stored in the 'to' object.

      Parameters:
      to - The denomination object where the values will be added.
      from - The denomination object containing the values to be added.

    • isSlotEmpty

      protected boolean isSlotEmpty(int slotNumber)
      Method that checks the availability of a slot.
      Parameters:
      slotNumber - specific location you want to check.
      Returns:
      boolean value, returned true relates that slot is empty, otherwise, it is not empty.

    • findDenomination

      protected Denomination findDenomination(float money, Denomination inventory)
      This method looks for the appropriate denomination from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      money - is the reference of inserted money.
      inventory - is the location of sets of money in machine
      Returns:
      a Denomination object representing the appropriate set of money the machine can produce for change.

    • differenceDenomination

      protected void differenceDenomination(Denomination minuend, Denomination subtrahend)

      Subtracts the values of each denomination in the 'subtrahend' from the corresponding values in the 'minuend'. The result is stored in the 'minuend'.

      Parameters:
      minuend - The denomination object from which the subtrahend values will be subtracted.
      subtrahend - The denomination object containing the values to be subtracted from the 'minuend'.
